title: "Developing Stan model"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
library(rstan)
library(tidybayes)
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
```

```{r}
test_data <- tibble(y = rbinom(100, size = 5, prob = 0.5) + 1, x = rnorm(100,0,1))

make_stancode(y ~ x, data = test_data, family = cumulative("logit"))
```
```{r}
make_standata(y ~ x, data = test_data, family = cumulative("logit"))
test_data$y 
```
